definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (house of iniquity or idolatry? hardly likely unless as alteration of orig. [[בֵּית אוֹן]], house of wealth or strength) eastward from Bethel Jos 7:2, Jos 18:12, 1Sa 14:23, 1Sa 13:5 ´[[בֵּית־א]] (on Ho 4:15, Ho 5:8, Ho 10:5 v. [[בֵּֽיתְאֵל]] infr.); site unknown.
